title: Le Discours de la Haine : The Discourse of Hate
description:
AndrÃ© Glucksmann
Le Discours de la Haine (Une Science Humaine de la Haine de lâ€™Humain)

'The Discourse of Hate' written by the French philosopher AndrÃ© Glucksmann (1937-2015) in 2004 is a tremendously actual book also for our modern times full of hate to our planet Earth, humanity and life. The author examines many ancient and contemporary histories where people hate and bomb each other and analyzes whether it's possible to transform selfishness, aggression and death drive. Unfortunately, nobody has translated this remarkable healing meditation into English yet. Thus, we have only French original text and Russian translation.

To read this electronic book you need the program iSilo reader that provides hyperlink navigation and search all over the book, is supported by more than 22 different computer operational systems and can be downloaded from the site isilo.com

There are two files in this torrent: one in Cyrillic encoding, another - in UTF-8. Some old pocket computers do not support Unicode
